titles.title: Low-Income Housing Credit bill
Public Housing Rehabilitation Equity Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make the low-income housing credit permanent and to facilitate the rehabilitation of public housing using such credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/1/1993--Introduced. Public Housing Rehabilitation Equity Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make the low-income housing credit permanent. Makes such housing credit available for rehabilitation of public housing.
